bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Alternative Names bi xia chi ni 鼻下赤䘌 , hidden worms with redness below the nose. Pathological Condition of ni 䘌 , hidden-worms, disease with redness and festering below both nostrils in children. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry wo niu 蝸牛 quoting Zi mu mi lu 子母秘錄 : 小兒鼻下兩道赤 者名曰䘌，亦名赤鼻疳 , “When the two paths below the nose of children are red, this is called ‘hidden worms’. Another name is ‘red nose gan -illness’”. writes: 小兒鼻䘌：鼻下兩道赤色，有疳 , “ Nose with hidden worms in children: the two paths below the nose assume a red color. They have a gan -illness”.
